response.original_title: Fruit of the Spirit Stories: Faithfulness, Gentleness, Self-Control
response.overview: Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber and the entire Veggie cast have put together all-new shows to help revive Mr. Nezzer's dilapidated theater. There always seems to be some sort of calamity before the curtain goes up, and Archibald Asparagus plays the role of the fixer-upper to make the shows go smoothly. The Veggies draw from stories from the Bible to learn about being a trustworthy person, having self-control and what it means to be gentle with others. Every show is filled with hilarious onstage performances, silly songs and crazy backstage antics that both entertain and bring home a lesson in Faithfulness, Gentleness and Self-Control. As part of the Bible's Fruit of the Spirit passage, kids will be inspired to practice these truths in big and small ways every day.
response.title: Fruit of the Spirit Stories: Faithfulness, Gentleness, Self-Control
